summary: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.
cast: Rod Taylor|J. Pat O'Malley|Betty Lou Gerson|Martha Wentworth|Ben Wright|Cate Bauer|David Frankham|Frederick Worlock|Lisa Davis|Tom Conway|Tudor Owen|George Pelling|Ramsay Hill|Sylvia Marriott|Queenie Leonard|Marjorie Bennett|Mickey Maga|Barbara Beaird|Mimi Gibson|Sandra Abbott|Thurl Ravenscroft|Bill Lee|Max Smith|Bob Stevens|Paul Wexler|Barbara Luddy|Lisa Daniels|Don Barclay|Dal McKennon|Jeanne Bruns|Basil Ruysdael|Lucille Bliss|Paul Frees|Junius Matthews|Clarence Nash|Rickie Sorensen
director: Directors: Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske (as Hamilton S. Luske) | 1 more credit »
title: 101 dálmatas
